effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Fortifying Brew for 6.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: When you gain  Luck of the Draw!, your next 2 casts of Blackout Kick deal 250% increased damage and incur a 2.0 sec reduced cooldown.

spells.description:
Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,151 Agility and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,453 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 928,451 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,263 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,345 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Fu Zan, the Wanderer's Companion

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 295,897 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 82,194 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
